trans-unit.source: Supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform data retrieval using Structured Query Language (SQL) against a Microsoft Access database.
trans-unit.target: 지원 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> 제어 하 고 SQL 구조적 쿼리 언어 ()를 사용 하 여 Microsoft Access 데이터베이스에 대해 데이터 검색을 수행 하는 데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤에 대 한 인터페이스를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The AccessDataSourceView class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls and not as a programmable object in page code.
trans-unit.target: AccessDataSourceView 클래스는 페이지 코드에서 프로그래밍 가능한 개체 하지 데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤에서 사용할 수 하는 데 주로 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The AccessDataSourceView class is provided because Microsoft Access is a file-based database system and has several unique characteristics that set it apart from other SQL-based relational database products that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> classes are used with.
trans-unit.target: AccessDataSourceView 클래스는 Microsoft Access 데이터베이스 파일 기반 시스템 이며을 다른 SQL 기반의 관계형 데이터베이스 제품 하는 여러 가지 고유한 특징 때문에 제공 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>제어 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>클래스를 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"></xref> class setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> control as the owner of the current view.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"> </xref> 설정 지정 된 클래스 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> 현재 보기의 소유자로 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control to access the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A> collections when retrieving data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>개체가에서 사용 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>컨트롤에서 매개 변수에 액세스 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A>컬렉션 데이터를 검색할 때.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The data source control with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"></xref> is associated.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 소스 제어는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"> </xref> 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A unique name for the data source view, within the scope of the data source control that owns it.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 원본 뷰를 소유 하는 데이터 소스 컨트롤의 범위 내에 대 한 고유 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the underlying data storage using the SQL string in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectCommand*> property and any parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 에 SQL 문자열을 사용 하 여 기본 데이터 저장소에서 데이터를 검색 된 <> </> *> 속성 및에서 매개 변수는 <> </> *> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> object overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method to ensure that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> property of its associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control is set before retrieving data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>재정의 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>않도록 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A>의 연결 된 속성 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>컨트롤 데이터를 검색 하기 전에 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Before the ExecuteSelect method is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Executeselect를 실행 메서드를 수행 하기 전에 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>를 발생 시키는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting> event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 처리할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting>이벤트 매개 변수의 값을 검사 하 고 모든 데이터 검색 작업을 하기 전에 전처리를 수행할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: To perform the data retrieval, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> object builds an <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> text and any associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 검색을 수행 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>개체는 <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>를 사용 하 여 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>텍스트와 모든 관련 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> object executes the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object against the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>실행 개체는 <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>내부 데이터 저장소에 대 한 개체입니다.</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: After the operation completes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected> event.
trans-unit.target: 작업이 완료 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>를 발생 시키는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected> event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing.
trans-unit.target: 처리할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>이벤트 모든 반환 값과 오류 코드를 검사 하 고 후 처리를 수행할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> value and caching is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>속성이로 설정 되어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>값 및 캐싱을 사용 하도록 설정 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>데이터에서 데이터 검색 작업 동안 캐시에 데이터를 저장 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed, based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 캐시 생성, 삭제 또는 새로 고침의 조합에 의해 지정 된 캐싱 동작에 따라는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> value and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> property has been specified, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is evaluated along with any supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>속성이로 설정 되어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>값 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>속성이 지정 된는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>함께 제공 된 속성이 확인 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>속성 및 결과 필터 목록 중 데이터에 적용 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>작업.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> 기본 데이터 검색 범위를 벗어난 데이터에 대 한 작업을 요청 하는 데 사용 되는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> of data rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>데이터 행의.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*>속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 또는 빈 문자열 ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*>

trans-unit.source: The arguments passed to the ExecuteSelect method specify that the data source should perform some additional work while retrieving data to enable paging or sorting through the retrieved data, but the data source control does not support the requested capability.
trans-unit.target: arguments 는 executeselect를 실행에 전달 된 메서드는 지정 데이터 원본 페이징 또는 검색 된 데이터를 정렬할 수 있도록 데이터를 검색 하는 동안 몇 가지 추가 작업을 수행 해야 하지만 데이터 소스 컨트롤은 필요한 기능을 지원 하지 않습니다.
